cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:
Pages have been submitted for translation. The source text and instructions are enclosed in a ZIP file.
This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)1fa64dad66c1c58f1ea1c727d76730d5478ad403e761a1f84189333df61ccca5%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)ecee9603829621fdc85fa9cd97b96114db6d9dd34a64fe226d746decc795604e%}.
To upload a ZIP archive with the completed translation, go to the following URL {% SubmissionLink %}.
